errors.oauthFailed: GitHub login failed. Please try again.
errors.invalidImage: Upload a valid image. The file you uploaded was either not an image or a corrupted image.
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many login attempts. Please wait a moment.
errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please refresh the page.

AboutUs.title: About Us
AboutUs.description: To spice up our binary programming adventure at 42Warsaw, we decided to add a splash of nature's colors. This is our final project within the so-called Common Core, so we are leaving this portal as a souvenir of a wonderful journey. Photos included for reach. üòè
AboutUs.footerText: You can be a gardener too!

errors.fillAllFields: Please fill in all fields and add a photo.

success.message: Your new plant has been successfully registered in the garden.
